name: Knight Captain Colvin

topics.response_text: Welcome, friend. My brothers may be gruff but they will lay down their lives for you.{welcoming}

conversation.response_text: All clear, Sentinel. Five mutants released from their torment. The rest are keeping their heads down.{replying to Sarah Lyons}

description:
Knight Captain Colvin is a 38 year-old Caucasian Male.

A seasoned veteran and devout member of the Brotherhood of Steel's Lyons' Pride, Knight Captain Colvin serves as one of the unit's two expert snipers. His unwavering faith provides him with exceptional calm in the face of danger, allowing him to execute his duties with precision and focus. Colvin maintains a warm demeanor toward his fellow soldiers, though he shares a friendly rivalry with fellow sniper Knight Captain Dusk.

Knight Captain Colvin's Personality: Calm, faithful, disciplined, and compassionate. Colvin's religious convictions shape his worldview, allowing him to find purpose in even the most dire circumstances. He is loyal to the Brotherhood's mission and protective of his fellow soldiers, while maintaining a competitive yet sportsmanlike relationship with Dusk.

Knight Captain Colvin's Backstory: Born in the remnants of a pre-War settlement in the Capital Wasteland, Colvin lost his family to raider attacks at a young age. He survived through his own resourcefulness and developed a keen eye for detail while hunting for food. After being rescued by Lyons' Brotherhood of Steel patrols, he found solace in their structured way of life and embraced their mission to help the wasteland's people. His natural marksmanship caught the attention of the Lyons' Pride leadership, and he was trained as a sniper, eventually rising to the rank of Knight Captain.
